channel.title: Could not check for software updates! (apt-get code: 100)
channel.description:
I get this for 3 days now
WARNING: Debian Package Update Check Result: Could not check for software updates! (apt-get code: 100) Please manually check: (Open a terminal, Start menu -> Applications -> System -> Terminal.)
I'm still with Up to date: Whonix Build Version 9

item.title: Could not check for software updates! (apt-get code: 100)
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
http://mirror.whonix.de wheezy repository apt error messages -> Whonix 10 -> forget about it -> upgrade -> https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Upgrading_Whonix_10_to_Whonix_11

Whonix Build Versoin explanation:

Whonix

Whonixcheck

Whonix Security Check Application. Sanity Test. Leak Test. Update Check.

Read full topic
item.source: Could not check for software updates! (apt-get code: 100)

item.title: Could not check for software updates! (apt-get code: 100)
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

are you sure you’re using the latest version of Whonix? Yesterday someone had a similar problem due to still using Whonix 10. Furthermore, like Patrick already posted, the build version doesn’t really tell which version you’re using since, as far as I’ve understood (though I maybe wrong here) after updating from for example Whonix 9 to 10, the build version remains the same.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Could not check for software updates! (apt-get code: 100)

item.title: Could not check for software updates! (apt-get code: 100)
item.dc:creator: Dani
item.description:
[quote=“Patrick, post:2, topic:1422”][quote]
WARNING: Debian Package Update Check Result: Could not check for software updates! (apt-get code: 100)
Please manually check:
(Open a terminal, Start menu -> Applications -> System -> Terminal.) [/quote]
Just go on reading and doing what whonixcheck suggests.[/quote]
I did. But doing
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get dist-upgrad
in the terminal gives
Err http://mirror.whonix.de wheezy/main i386 Packages
404 Not Found
W: Failed to fetch http://mirror.whonix.de/whonixdevelopermetafiles/internal/dists/wheezy/main/binary-i386/Packages 404 Not Found

E: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead.

Read full topic
